K02psp_6-8u:1620: ātmanā ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca caturthe dhyāne
K02psp_6-8u:1621: niveśayeyam, ātmanā ca maitrīṃ bhāvayeyaṃ, sarvasattvāṃś ca maitrībhāvanāyāṃ niveśayeyam, evaṃ karuṇāmuditām ātmanā copekṣāṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃ copekṣābhāvanāyāṃ niveśayeyam, ātmanā cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś cākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
K02psp_6-8u:1622: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiñcanyāyatanasamāpattim, ātmanā ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadye sarvasattvāṃś ca naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau pratiṣṭhāpayeyam, ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca smṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam, evaṃ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāny, ātmanā cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś cāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyam, ātmanā ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayeyaṃ sarvasattvāṃś ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhabhāvanāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ, tasya mamānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya,
K02psp_6-8u:1623: sarvasattvā evaṃ caturbhir dhyānair avirahitā bhāveyuś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhir avirahitā bhāveyuś caturbhir brāhmair vihārair avirahitā bhaveyuḥ, saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair avirahitā
K02psp_6-8u:1625: bhaveyur ity, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1626: pariśodhayati, sa tāvad bodhau carati yāvad ime sarvābhiprāyāḥ paripūrṇā bhavanti, sa ātmanā ca sarvakuśaladharmasamanvāgato bhavati, parāṃś ca sarvakuśaladharmasamanvāgatān karoti, tasya svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko
K02psp_6-8u:1627: darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati, ye ca tena
K02psp_6-8u:1628: boodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāḥ paripācitās teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ svabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyo mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇavibhūṣita ātmabhāvo bhavati yad uta puṇyaparigrahād, evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena buddhaksetraṃ pariśodhayitavyaṃ, yathā trayāṇām apāyānāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1629: prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati, sarvadṛṣṭigatānāṃ prajñaptir api na
K02psp_6-8u:1630: bhaviṣyati, rāgadoṣamohānāṃ prajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati, yāvad dvayasya nāmadheyam api na bhaviṣyati, anityaduṣkhānātmāśubhaprajñaptir api na
K02psp_6-8u:1632: ahaṃkāramamakāraprajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati, phalavyavasthānaprajñaptir api na bhaviṣyati, anyatra śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasya samādher ghoṣaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1633: pracariṣyati, tyāgecchatāyāḥ yāvat prajñecchatāyāḥ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ chandād eva vṛkṣebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti vāteritebhyaḥ evaṃ sarvebhyo 'dhyātmikabāhyebhyo dharmebhyo ghoṣā niścariṣyanti, śūnyam iti vānimittam
K02psp_6-8u:1634: iti vāpraṇihitain iti vā śabdo niścariṣyati, anutpādānirodhānāṃ śabdo niścariṣyati, yathaiva sarvadharmāṇāṃ naiḥsvābhāvyaṃ tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyati, sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti, yathaiteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvas tathāiva śabdo niścariṣyaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā
K02psp_6-8u:1635: tathāgatānāṃ sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ, yac chūnyan na tatra nimittam asti tad apraṇihitam eṣā saivaṃ rūpādharmadeśanā niścariṣyati
K02psp_6-8u:1636: rātrau divase vā sthitāṇāṃ vā niṣaṇṇānāṃ vā śayanānāṃ vā caṅkramatāṃ vā idṛśāḥ sarvadharmadeśanā niścariṣyanti. tatra buddhakṣetre yadāsau
K02psp_6-8u:1638: tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaiva sato ye daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, te (PSP_6-8:130) sarve 'sya varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyante, ye ca tasya varṇaṃ sattvā śroṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ vā te sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhyau. tasya khalu punas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kasyacit sattvasya saṃśayo bhaviṣyati, ayaṃ dharmo 'yan na dharmaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ? yā khalu punaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1639: sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā na tatra kaścid adharmaḥ sarva eva sa dharmaḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1640: tatra ye sattvā akuśalamūlagrastā vānavaropitakuśalamūlā vā buddheṣu vā buddhaśrāvakeṣu vā kalyāṇamitrāparigṛhītā ātmadṛṣṭim ālīyante yāvat paśyakadṛṣṭim ālīyante, anteṣu tiṣṭhanti, ucchede vā śāśvate vā, ātmanā mithyāgraheṇa gṛhītā asamyaksaṃbuddheṣu samyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñin,
K02psp_6-8u:1641: samyaksaṃbuddheṣu vāsamyaksaṃbuddhasaṃjñinas te 'dharme dharma iti vadanti, te dharmaṃ pratikṣipanti te dharmaṃ pratikṣipya kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyante, tāṃs te buddhā
K02psp_6-8u:1643: saṃsāraparyāpannāṃs tataḥ pāpakadṛṣṭigatād vivecayanti vivecya niyate rāśau pratiṣṭhāpayanti. te tatra pratiṣṭhāpitā na punar apāyeṣūpapadyante.
K02psp_6-8u:1644: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayati,
K02psp_6-8u:1645: yasya pariśuddhasya na kiṃcit sattvānāṃ vaikalyaṃ bhaviṣyati laukikeṣu vā dharmeṣu lokottareṣu vā dharmeṣu sāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣv anāsraveṣu vā dharmeṣu saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu vā dharmeṣu yāvat sarve niyatā bhaviṣyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
K02psp_6-8u:1646: iti buddhakṣetraviśuddhiniveśanakarma atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavan
K02psp_6-8u:1648: bhagavān āha: niyataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1649: subhūtir āha: katame rāśau niyataḥ śrāvakarāśau vā pratyekabuddharāśau vā?
K02psp_6-8u:1650: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakarāśau vā niyataḥ pratyekabuddharāśau vā niyato 'pi tu buddharāśau subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1651: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyataḥ prathamacittotpādika (PSP_6-8:131) utāho 'vinivartanīyo 'tha
K02psp_6-8u:1653: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo vā niyataḥ caramabhaviko vā niyato 'pi tu prathamacittotpādiko niyataḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1654: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niyato
K02psp_6-8u:1656: bhagavān āha: na subhūte niyataḥ patito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
K02psp_6-8u:1657: 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate. tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api tv aṣṭamako vā srotaāpanno
K02psp_6-8u:1658: vā sakṛdāgāmi vā anāgāmi vārhan vā pratyekabuddho vā niyato
K02psp_6-8u:1661: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate
K02psp_6-8u:1662: naitat sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yaḥ punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ rakṣati kṣāntiṃ saṃpādayati vīryam ārabhate dhyānaṃ samāpadyate prajñāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1663: bhāvayati, maitrīṃ karuṇāṃ muditām upekṣāṃ sattveṣu bhāvayati, sarvān akuśalān dharmān prahāya tiṣṭhati, so 'pāyeṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, dīrghāyuṣkeṣu vā deveṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K02psp_6-8u:1664: yatrāpacāraḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyanteṣu vā janapadeṣūpatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapadyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
K02psp_6-8u:1665: tatra copapatsyate yatra na buddhaśabdo na dharmaśabdo na saṃghaśabdaḥ śruyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, akriyādṛṣṭikeṣu vā kuleṣūpapatsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, api tu khalu subhūte prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo
K02psp_6-8u:1667: daśākuśalān karmapathān adhyāpadyeta nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
K02psp_6-8u:1668: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ kuśaladharmasamanvāgato yad uta nāpratirūpeṣu
K02psp_6-8u:1669: sthāneṣūpapatsyate, tat kiṃ tathāgatenātmanā jātakāni nirdiṣṭāni, ime punaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1670: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na punaḥ suhbūte
K02psp_6-8u:1672: yenātmabhāvena sattvānām arthaḥ kartavyaḥ tam ātmabhāvaṃ sattvānām arthāya pratigṛhṇāti, kiṃ punaḥ subhūte 'sty etad arhataḥ pratyekabuddhasya vā upāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tiryagyonāv upapannaḥ syāt.
K02psp_6-8u:1674: bhagavān āha: tathāgatasya tad upāyakauśalyam asti yena tatropapannaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1675: syād, ye ca tatra vadhāya parākramante tān anuttarāyāṃ kṣāntau samādāpayati vinaye pratiṣṭhāpayati teṣām eva cārthe ātmānaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1676: parityajayati, na ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viheṭhanā bhavati, tad anena te
K02psp_6-8u:1677: suhbūte paryāyenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānām arthāya mahākaruṇāṃ paripūrayamāṇo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tiryagyonau vartate.
K02psp_6-8u:1678: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katameṣu bhagavan kuśaladharmeṣu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imam evaṃrūpam ātmabhāvaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1680: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: sarvan tat subhūte
K02psp_6-8u:1681: kuśalaṃ karma yad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrayitavyaṃ,
K02psp_6-8u:1682: sarvakuśaladharmaparipūrir anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇena na kaścid dharmo yo na paripūrayitavyo yena paripūritenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta, tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena
K02psp_6-8u:1683: prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvakuśaladharmaparipūryai śikṣitavayaṃ yatra śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiṃ prahāsyati.
K02psp_6-8u:1684: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ punar bhagavan
K02psp_6-8u:1685: bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvac chukladharmasamanvāgata āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇāpāyeṣūpapadyate tiryagyonau vā?
K02psp_6-8u:1686: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte tathāgata āryo 'nāsravaḥ?
K02psp_6-8u:1688: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryagyonigataṃ prāṇinam ātmānam
K02psp_6-8u:1690: subhūtir āha: kuryād bhagavan kuryāt sugata.
K02psp_6-8u:1691: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tathāgatas tiryag bhavati?
K02psp_6-8u:1693: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punas tiryagyoner duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavati?
K02psp_6-8u:1695: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāśraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvagataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1696: parigṛhṇāti, yenātmabhāvena samanvāgatam anyān paripācayed yathā tathāgataḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1697: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatas tan nirmitam abhinirmiṇoti,
K02psp_6-8u:1698: yad abhinirmāya karma kārayati, yena karmaṇā pareṣāṃ prītir jāyate?
K02psp_6-8u:1699: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgatas tat tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1700: parigṛhṇāti, yenātmabhāvena samanvāgataḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti, na ca tathārūpāṃ vedanāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1701: subhūtir āha: na hi bhagavan duṣkhā apāyā?
K02psp_6-8u:1702: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte māyākārā māyāṃ darśayati,
K02psp_6-8u:1703: hastivigrahaṃ vāśvavigrahaṃ vā balīvardavigrahaṃ vānyān vā vividhān prāṇakajātān darśayaty api tu sa hastī vā bhavati, aśvo vā balīvardavigraho vānye vā vividhāḥ prāṇakajātā bhavanti.
K02psp_6-8u:1705: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bodhisattvo mahāsattva āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgataḥ sañcintya tathārūpam ātmabhāvaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1706: parigṛhṇāti yenātmabhāveṇa samanvāgataḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti, na ca tathārūpāṃ vedanāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1707: subhūtir āha: mahopāyakuśalo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo nāma bhagavann
K02psp_6-8u:1708: āryeṇānāsraveṇa dharmeṇa samanvāgato yena yena hy ātmabhāvena śakyate sattvānām arthaḥ kartun taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
K02psp_6-8u:1709: iti samyaksaṃbodhipratiniyamaniveśanakarma katameṣu bhagavan śukleṣu dharmeṣu sthitvā idam evaṃrūpam upāyakauśalyaṃ karoti yena tair na lipyate?
K02psp_6-8u:1710: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte sthitvā bodhisattvo (PSP_6-8:134)
K02psp_6-8u:1712: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarasyām adhamūrdhaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti, na tatra kvacit spṛśyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvathaiva dharmān nopalabhate, yad vā spṛśyeta yena vā spṛśyeta yo vā spṛśyet. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarva ete trayo dharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyāḥ tatra na śūnyatayā śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate naiva śūnyatāṃ kaścit saṃspṛśati,
K02psp_6-8u:1713: nāpi śūnyatā saṃspṛśyate, tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svabhāvaśūnyatayā
K02psp_6-8u:1714: śūnyatā nopalabhyate, iyaṃ sānupalaṃbhaśūnyatā yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K02psp_6-8u:1715: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyām eva sthito nānyeṣu
K02psp_6-8u:1717: bhagavān āha: katamo vā subhūte dharmoe yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāntargataḥ?
K02psp_6-8u:1718: subhūtir āha: yad bhagavan prajñāpāramitāsvabhāvena śūnyā, tat kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā antargatāḥ, na hi bhagavañ chūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharmāntargataḥ?
K02psp_6-8u:1719: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ, na ca sarvadharmāḥ śūnyatāyām antargatāḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1720: ity aprameyasattvārthaniveśanakarma atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharme śūnyatāyāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1721: sthitvā abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati, yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā pūrvasyān diśi gaṅgānadī vālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati, teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, tān paryupāste dharmañ
K02psp_6-8u:1722: ca śṛṇoti teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavansu kuśalamūlāny avaropayaty, evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhavaṃ vidikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gacchati, teṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti, tān paryupāste dharmañ ca śṛṇoti teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayati.
K02psp_6-8u:1723: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran ye te pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavas tān sarvān śūnyān paśyati, ye 'pi tatra buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ svabhāveṇa śūnyā, anyatra nāmasaṃketāt prajñāptim upādāya nirdiśyante, sā ca sarvā prajñaptiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā. yadi te lokadhātavo na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs, te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs, te 'pi prajñaptisamudācārā na svabhāvena śūnyā abhaviṣyaṃs,
K02psp_6-8u:1724: tatprādeśikī śūnyatābhaviṣyad yasmāt prādeśikī śūnyatā nopalabhyate tasmāt sarvadharmā sarvadharmaiḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1725: atra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāpāramitām abhinirharati, yāsv abhijñāsu sthitvā divyañ cakṣur abhinirharati, divyaṃ śrotram ṛddhividhijñānaṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ cyutyupapattim abhinirharati. ābhir abhijñābhir bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhuṃ, yad iyaṃ bodhisattvasya
K02psp_6-8u:1726: mahāsattvasyābhijñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhir antargatā, abhijñāsu bodhir antargatā mārgayitavyāyāṃ mārgayamāṇo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇātmanas tān kuśalān dharmān paśyati, parāṃś ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu niyojayati, na ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣv abhinivekṣyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te sarvakuśalā dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ, na ca śūnyatā kvacid abhinivekṣyate yad abhiniveśam āsvādayiṣyati
K02psp_6-8u:1728: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran divyaṃ cakṣur abhinirharati yena cakṣuṣā sarvadharmā śūnyān paśyati, tat punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tān dharmān āgamya tat karmābhinirūpayati, yayā karmābhiniruktyā sattvānān dharmaṃ deśayati na punaḥ sattvaprajñaptim uplabhyate, ity anupalaṃbhayogena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām abhijñā abhinirharati, yāsv abhijñāsv abhijñā
K02psp_6-8u:1730: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyāṃ diśy uttarasyāṃ diśy adha ūrdhvalokadhātuṣu yāvad vidikṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvān paśyati, (PSP_6-8:136)
K02psp_6-8u:1731: sa tatrarddhyā gatvā sattvānām arthaṃ karoti, yadi vā dānena yadi vā śīlena yadi vā kṣāntyā yadi vā vīryeṇa yadi vā dhyānena yadi vā prajñayā yadi vā saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyair dharmair yadi
K02psp_6-8u:1732: vāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhair yadi vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmair yadi vā bodhisattvadharmair yadi vā buddhadharmais teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti.
K02psp_6-8u:1733: tatra ye sattvā matsariṇas teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, dadata dānan duṣkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dāridryan na ca dāridryeṇa śakyam ātmano 'rthaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1734: kartuṃ prāg eva parasya, tasmād yūyam ātmanā ca sukhino bhaviṣyatha parāṃś ca sukhayiṣyatha mā dāridryeṇānyeṣāṃ māṃsāni khādayanto na mokṣyatha
K02psp_6-8u:1736: ye duḥśīlā sattvās teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, duḥkhaṃ hi bhoḥ puruṣā dauḥśīlyaṃ na ca dauḥśīlyena śakyam ātmano 'thaḥ kartuṃ prāg eva parasya,
K02psp_6-8u:1737: dauḥśīlyasya ca yo vipāko narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tatra yūyaṃ triṣv apāyeṣu prapatitā ātmānam eva na śakyathoddhartuṃ prāg eva paraṃ,
K02psp_6-8u:1738: tad bhavadbhir ekadauśīlyacittasyāpy avakāśo na dātavyaḥ, mā paścāt prabhūtaṃ kālaṃ tapyata.
K02psp_6-8u:1739: ye sattvāḥ pratihatacittāḥ parasya caṃ krudhyanti vyāpadyante doṣam utpādayatām eṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, mā bhavanto 'nyonyaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1740: kṣubhyathānyonyaṃ vyāpadyadhve mā doṣam utpādayata kṣubdhacittasya hi na kaścit kuśalo dharma āmukhī bhavati, tad bhavanto 'nyonyam evaṃ kṣubdhacittā vyāpannacittāḥ sthānam etad vidyate yan narakaṃ vā prapatathā tiryagyoniṃ vā yamalokaṃ vā, tad bhavadbhir ekacittenāpi na kṣobdhavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām avakāśo dātavyaḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1741: ye kuśīdāḥ sattvās tān vīrye niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśyati, mā bhavantaḥ kauśīdyam āpadyadhvaṃ na kusīdānāṃ hīnavīryāṇāṃ kācic chubhā
K02psp_6-8u:1742: pravṛttiḥ sthānam etad vidyate yat kuśīdānān narako vā tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir ekasyāpi kuśīdacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittānām.
K02psp_6-8u:1743: ye vikṣiptacittāḥ sattvās tān sarvān dhyāne niyojayati, teṣāṃ evaṃ (PSP_6-8:137) dharmaṃ deśayati, mā bhavanto muṣitasmṛtayo vikṣiptacittāś ca bhavatan muṣitasmṛtīnām vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā kuśalā dharmā bhavanti
K02psp_6-8u:1744: sthānam etad vidyate, yaṃ muṣitasmṛtīnāṃ vikṣiptacittānāṃ vā narako vā
K02psp_6-8u:1745: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā tad bhavadbhir ekasyāpi vikṣiptacittasyāvakāśo na dātavyaḥ, prāg evānyesāñ cittānām.
K02psp_6-8u:1746: ye duṣprajñāḥ sattvās tān sarvān prajñāyāṃ niyojayati, teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1747: deśayati, mā yūyaṃ dauṣprajñacittam utpādayedhvaṃ nāprajñānāṃ sugatigamanaṃ bhavati sthānam etad vidyate yad duṣprajñānāṃ narako vā
K02psp_6-8u:1748: tiryagyonir vā yamaloko vā, tad bhavadbhir ekacittotpādo 'pi
K02psp_6-8u:1749: prajñāvirahito notpādayitavyaṃ prāg evānyeṣāṃ cittotpādānām avakāśo
K02psp_6-8u:1751: ye rāgacaritāḥ sattvās tān śubhabhāvanāyāṃ niyojayati, ye mārge 'sthitāḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1752: sattvās tān mārge niyojayati yadi vā śrāvakamārge niyojayati, yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge niyojayati teṣām evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, yatra bhavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāt te dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ, na svabhāvena śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu śakyam abhiniveṣṭum anabhiniviṣṭā ca śūnyatā.
K02psp_6-8u:1753: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann abhijñāsu sthitvā sattvānām upakāraṃ karoti.
K02psp_6-8u:1754: nāsti sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaḥ śakto 'bhijñāsv asthitvā sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kartum, utpathaprasthitān vā sattvān mārge
K02psp_6-8u:1755: 'vatārayituṃ nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tadyathā subhūte 'pakṣaḥ pakṣī na śaknoty ākāśe kramitum, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nāgamyābhijñā na śaknoti sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayituṃ, tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā
K02psp_6-8u:1757: sa imābhir abhijñābhir abhinirhṛtābhir yad ākāṅkṣati sattvānām arthaṃ kartuṃ tat kariṣyati divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn drakṣyati tatra sattvā utpannās tān
K02psp_6-8u:1758: drakṣyati, dṛṣṭvā ca tān satttvān ṛddhyā gatvā cetasaiva cittaṃ prajñāsyati, cittaṃ jñātvā tathāiva teṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, yadi vā dānakathāṃ (PSP_6-8:138) yadi vā śīlakathāṃ yadi vā kṣāntikathāṃ yadi vā vīryakathāṃ yadi vā dhyānakathāṃ yadi vā prajñākathāṃ yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1760: sa divyena śrotradhātunā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇobhau śabdau śroṣyati mānuṣyañ cāmānuṣyañ ca, tatra ye gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayati, tan divyena śrotradhātunā śrutvā tathāivodgrahīṣyati tathāivodgṛhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati, dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K02psp_6-8u:1761: tasya cetaḥparyāyajñānaṃ suviśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati sa tena cetaḥparyāyajñānena suviśuddhena sattvānāṃ cittaṃ prajñāsyati, cittaṃ jñātvā teṣāṃ tathāiva dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K02psp_6-8u:1762: so 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anuspariṣyati, apy ātmanaḥ pareṣām api sa tena
K02psp_6-8u:1763: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtijñānena evaṃ jñāsyati, evaṃnāmāni te 'bhūvan pūrvakās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghās tatra ye sattvāḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtyadhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti tebhyas tathāiva dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā
K02psp_6-8u:1764: dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K02psp_6-8u:1765: so 'nekavividhayā ṛddhyā samanvāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn gatvā buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyati kuśalamūlāny avaropya tad eva punar buddhakṣetram
K02psp_6-8u:1766: āgamiṣyati, āgatya teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1768: tasyāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānaṃ supariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati, sa tenāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñājñānena suviśuddhena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati, dānakathāṃ vā śīlakathāṃ vā kṣāntikathāṃ vā vīryakathāṃ vā dhyānakathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ vā yāvan (PSP_6-8:139) nirvāṇakathāṃ vā.
K02psp_6-8u:1769: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā abhijñā abhinirhartavyāḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1770: sa imābhir abhijñābhir nihṛtābhir yaṃ yam evākāṅkṣiṣyaty ātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahītuṃ taṃ tam evātmabhāvaṃ pratigrahīṣyati, na ca tena sukhena vā duḥkhena vā sumanā vā durmanā vā bhaviṣyati, naivāsyānunaya pratighau bhaviṣyathaḥ. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte buddhanirmitaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvakṛtyāni
K02psp_6-8u:1771: karoti, na ca tena sukhena vā duṣkhena vā lipyate.
K02psp_6-8u:1772: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratābhijñābhir vikrīḍitavyam evaṃ vikrīḍaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayiṣyati sattvān paripācayiṣyati.
K02psp_6-8u:1773: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariśuddheṣu buddhakṣetreṣu paripāciteṣu sattveṣu śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum. tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti hi subhūte aṅgahānir asya bodhisattvasya
K02psp_6-8u:1775: iti buddhopasaṃkramaṇopāsanādiniveśanakarma atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamāni bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhyaṅgāni yāni bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1777: evam ukte bhāgavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: sarve kuśalā dharmāḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1779: subhūtir āha: te punar bhagavan katame kuśalā dharmā yaiḥ kuśalaiḥ dharmair anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
K02psp_6-8u:1780: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte dānapāramitā kuśalo dharmas tatra ca yāvikalpanā yad dānaṃ na jānātīdaṃ dānaṃ yasyārthe dātavyaṃ yena dātavyaṃ, te cāsya trayo
K02psp_6-8u:1781: vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya, yayā pāramitayātmanā ca
K02psp_6-8u:1782: tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye (PSP_6-8:140) mārgaḥ, yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti
K02psp_6-8u:1783: tariṣyanti ca. evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā prajñāpāramitā kuśalā dharmās tatra ca yāvikalpanā, yat prajñāṃ na jānātīyaṃ prajñā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyā, te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yayā
K02psp_6-8u:1784: prajñāpāramitayā, ātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgaḥ, yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvās tīrṇās taranti tariṣyanti ca.
K02psp_6-8u:1785: evaṃ catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāni pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṅgāni, āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ, aṣṭavimokṣanavānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni sarvasamādhayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni pañcābhijñā daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalā dharmās teṣu cāvikalpanā yad buddhadharmān na jānātīme buddhadharmā yasyārthe bhāvayitavyā yena bhāvayitavyās te cāsya trayo vikalpā na saṃvidyante
K02psp_6-8u:1786: svabhāvaśūnyatām upādāya yair buddhadharmair ātmanā ca tarati sattvāṃś ca saṃsārād uttārayatīme te kuśalā dharmā bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasyānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye mārgaḥ, yena mārgeṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā mahāsattvās tīrṇās taranti ca tariṣyanti ca, yāvantaḥ subhūte kecid bodhaye mārgās tān kuśalān dharmān bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripūrya sarvākārajñatānuprāptavyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam.
K02psp_6-8u:1787: iti bodhyaṅganiveśanakarma atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann
K02psp_6-8u:1789: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: yat punar āyuṣmān
K02psp_6-8u:1790: subhūtir evam āha, yadīme dharmā bodhisattvadharmā buddhadharmāḥ punaḥ katame? eta eva subhūte buddhadharmā yad (PSP_6-8:141) ebhir dharmaiḥ sarvākārajñatām abhisaṃbudhyate tasya sarvākārajñatāprāptasya sarvavāsanānusaṃdhiḥ prahīyate, tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhisaṃbudhyate
K02psp_6-8u:1791: tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmā ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā abhisaṃbuddhā ayaṃ viśeso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya. tad yathāpi nāma subhūte anya eva
K02psp_6-8u:1792: pratipannako 'nyaḥ phalasthaḥ, na ca tāv ubhāv api nāgrapudgalau, evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattva ānantaryamārgapratipannakas tathāgataḥ punar arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anāvaraṇajñānaprāptaḥ, ayaṃ subhūte viśeṣo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ca tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1794: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann ime
K02psp_6-8u:1795: dharmāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyās tat kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vopalabhyate? ayaṃ nairayiko 'yaṃ tairyagyoniko 'yaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1796: yāmalaukiko 'yaṃ devo 'yaṃ manuṣyo 'yaṃ gotrabhūmir ayam aṣṭamako 'yaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1797: srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho
K02psp_6-8u:1798: 'yaṃ bodhisattvo 'yaṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti, yathaiva bhagavann ime pudgalā nopalabhyante tathāiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate,
K02psp_6-8u:1799: yathaiva bhagavan karma nopalabhyate tathāiva vipāko nopalabhyate.
K02psp_6-8u:1800: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmaṇtaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: evam etat subhūte evam
K02psp_6-8u:1801: etat, yathā vadasi svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu na karma na vipāka upalabhyate, ye svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān sattvā nābhijānanti te
K02psp_6-8u:1802: karmābhisaṃkurvanti duścaritaṃ vā sucaritaṃ vā sāsravaṃ vānāsravaṃ vā, te duścaritena karmaṇā triṣv apāyeṣu prapatanti, narakeṣu vā tiryagyonau vā yamaloke vā, sucaritena devamanuṣyeṣūpapadyante, anācchedya rūpadhātau copapadyante, tad bodhisatttvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
K02psp_6-8u:1803: śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran, vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran,
K02psp_6-8u:1804: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran, upāyapāramitāyāṃ caran,
K02psp_6-8u:1810: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran, pañcasv abhijñāsu caran, daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu caran, daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caran, caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu caran, catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu caran, aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu carann acchidracārīmān bodhisattvadharmān utpādayati yānutpādya bodhyaṅgaparivārasahagataṃ vajropamaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'nutttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate, abhisaṃbudhya sattvānām arthaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1811: karoti, yenārthena kṛtena na punar vipraṇasyanti yena vipraṇāśeṇa pañcagatike saṃsāre prapateyuḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1812: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya pañcagatikaḥ saṃsāra upalabdhaḥ?
K02psp_6-8u:1814: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavatā kṛṣṇāṃ vā śuklaṃ vā karmopalabdham?
K02psp_6-8u:1816: subhūtir āha: yadi nopalabdhaṃ kuto narakas tiryagyonir yamalokaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1820: bhagavān āha: kiṃ punaḥ subhūte ete sattvā jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti?
K02psp_6-8u:1822: bhagavān āha: yadi subhūte sattvā evaṃ jānīyuḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1823: sarvadharmā iti, na bodhisattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhetānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthitvā na sattvān mocayet, tribhyo
K02psp_6-8u:1824: 'pāyebhyo yāvat pañcagatikāt saṃsārād, yasmāt tarhi subhūte (PSP_6-8:143)
K02psp_6-8u:1825: sattvā na jānanti svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmāṃs te 'jñatā na parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike śrutvā svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān anuttarāyāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1826: samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhet, ime dharmās tathā na saṃvidyante yathā
K02psp_6-8u:1827: bālapṛthagjanā abhiniviṣṭhās te sattvā asato 'saṃvidyamānāṃ dharmān svayam eva vikalpayanty upalabhante vāsattve sattvasaṃjñino 'rūpe rūpasaṃjñino
K02psp_6-8u:1835: asaṃvidyamānānāṃ viparyāse 'viparyastacittāḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca
K02psp_6-8u:1836: karmābhisaṃskurvanti, te pañcagatikāt saṃsārād na parimucyante, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpārmitāyāṃ caran sarvān antargatān kuśalān dharmān kṛtvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ carati, yayā caryayā carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
K02psp_6-8u:1837: iti karmaphalasaṃbandho vipraṇāsaniveśanakarma anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya duṣkhañ ca duṣkhasamudayaṃ ca duṣkhanirodhañ ca duḥkhanirodhagāminīñ ca pratipadam ākhyāti deśayati prakāśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati prajñāpayati pratiṣṭhāpayati, eṣu caturṣv āryasatyeṣu sarvāntargatāḥ kuśalā dharmā ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmā yair
K02psp_6-8u:1838: bodhipākṣikair dharmais trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K02psp_6-8u:1839: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām? buddharatnasya dharmaratnasya saṃgharatnasya, eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ prādurbhāvāt sattvāḥ parimucyante pañcagatikāt saṃsārāt.
K02psp_6-8u:1840: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kiṃ punar bhagavan
K02psp_6-8u:1841: duḥkhajñānena parinirvānti, atha duṣkhena parinirvānti? utāho samudayajñānena parinirvānti, atha samudayena parinirvānti? utāho
K02psp_6-8u:1843: utāho mārgajñānena parinirvānti, atha mārgeṇa parinirvānti?
K02psp_6-8u:1844: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na subhūte duṣkhajñānena parinirvānti na duṣkhena, na samudayajñānena na samudayena,
K02psp_6-8u:1845: na nirodhajñānena na nirodhena, na mārgajñānena parinirvānti na mārgeṇa,
K02psp_6-8u:1846: yā punaḥ subhūte caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ samatā tat parinirvāṇam uktaṃ mayā,
K02psp_6-8u:1847: na punar duḥkhena parinirvānti na duṣkhajñānena, na samudayena na
K02psp_6-8u:1848: samudayajñānena, na nirodhena na nirodhajñānena, na mārgeṇa parinirvānti
K02psp_6-8u:1850: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: katamā bhagavan caturṇām āryasatyānāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1851: bhagavān āha: yatra subhūte na duṣkhan na duṣkhajñānaṃ, yatra na samudayo
K02psp_6-8u:1852: na samudayajñānaṃ, yatra na nirodho na nirodhajñānaṃ, yatra na mārgo na
K02psp_6-8u:1853: mārgajñānam, api tu khalu subhūte yā eṣāṃ caturṇām āryasatyāṇāṃ tathatāvitathatānanyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā yasyotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmādhātur yāsaṃpramoṣadharmatāyai aparihāṇadharmatāyai saṃpravartate, tāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1854: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati, yathā satyānubodhaye carati, yathā satyāny
K02psp_6-8u:1855: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: kathaṃ punar bhagavan
K02psp_6-8u:1856: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran satyānubodhaye carati,
K02psp_6-8u:1857: yathā caran satyāny anubudhyate, abhisaṃbudhya tathatvāya pratipadyate,
K02psp_6-8u:1858: yathā pratipadyamāno na śrāvakabhūmiṃ patati na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ patati bodhisattvaniyāmam
K02psp_6-8u:1859: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat: na so dharmo yasyāntaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1860: paśyati, tathā ca paśyati yathā na kañcid dharmam upalabhate,
K02psp_6-8u:1861: anupalaṃbhamānaḥ sarvadharmā śūnyā iti paśyati, satyaparyāpannāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1862: (PSP_6-8:145) vā asatyaparyāpannāṃ vā taṃ sarve śunyā iti paśyati, sa evaṃ paśyann avakrāntaniyāmo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gotrabhūmau sthito bhavati,
K02psp_6-8u:1863: tasya gotrabhūmau sthitasya na mūrdhavinipāto bhavati yena mūrdhavinipātena śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patet, sa iha gotrabhūmau sthitvā catvāri dhyānāny utpādayati, catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattīr utpādayati, sa iha śamathabhūmau sthitvā sarvadharmān pravicinoti, catvāry āryasatyāny anubudhyate, sa duḥkhañ ca
K02psp_6-8u:1864: parijānāti na ca duṣkhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati, samudayañ ca prajahāti
K02psp_6-8u:1865: na ca samudayārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati, nirodhañ ca sākṣātkaroti na ca nirodhārambaṇaṃ cittam utpādayati, mārgañ ca bhāvayati na ca mārgārambaṇaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1866: cittam utpādayati, anyatra bodhinimnena cittena bodhipraveśena bodhiprāgbhāreṇa cittena sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati.
K02psp_6-8u:1867: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmān yathāvat paśyati?
K02psp_6-8u:1869: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmān śūnyān paśyati?
K02psp_6-8u:1870: bhagavān āha: yad uta svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān paśyati, yo
K02psp_6-8u:1871: 'nayaivaṃrūpayā vipaśyanayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti paśyati, na ca kasyacid
K02psp_6-8u:1872: dharmasya svabhāvaṃ paśyati, yatra svabhāve sthitvānuttarāṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1874: subhūtir āha: evaṃ sati bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvā bodhiḥ.
K02psp_6-8u:1875: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etad, yathā vadasi, abhāvasvabhāvā subhūte bodhiḥ, sā na buddhena kṛtā na pratyekabuddhena nārhatā nāpi tair
K02psp_6-8u:1876: bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ya iha samādhau caranty anyatra sattvā na jānanti na paśyanti, tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalyena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
K02psp_6-8u:1877: iti satyadarśanaviveśanakarma atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat: yadi bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmās tadā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ (PSP_6-8:146)
K02psp_6-8u:1878: śikṣitukāmena rūpe kathaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ? vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu
K02psp_6-8u:1879: vijñāne kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? cakṣurāyatane śrotrāyatane ghrāṇāyatane
K02psp_6-8u:1880: jihvāyatane kāyāyatane manaāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? rūpāyatane śabdāyatane gandhāyatane rasāyatane spraṣṭavyāyatane dharmāyatane kathaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1881: śikṣitavyam? cakṣurdhātau rūpadhātau cakṣurvijñānadhātau, śrotradhātau śabdadhātau śrotravijñānadhātau, ghrāṇadhātau gandhadhātau ghrāṇavijñānadhātau, jihvādhātau rasadhātau jihvāvijñānadhātau, kāyadhātau spraṣṭavyadhātau kāyavijñānadhātau, manodhātau dharmadhātau manovijñānadhātau kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? cakṣuḥsaṃsparśāyatane śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśāyatane kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? avidyāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu vijñāne nāmarūpe ṣaḍāyatane sparśe vedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇāyām upādāne
K02psp_6-8u:1882: bhave jātau jarāmaraṇe kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? duṣkhasatye samudayasatye nirodhasatye mārgasatye kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? rūpiṣu dharmeṣv arūpiṣu
K02psp_6-8u:1883: sanidarśaneṣv anidarśaneṣu sapratigheṣv apratigheṣu saṃskṛteṣv asaṃskṛteṣu sāsraveṣv anāsraveṣu sāvadyeṣv anavadyeṣu hīneṣu praṇīteṣv adhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣv atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu kuśalākuśalavyākṛtāvyākṛteṣu kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu rūpapratisaṃyukteṣv ārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu śaikṣeṣv aśaikṣeṣu naivaśaikṣanāśaikṣeṣu kathaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1884: śikṣitavyam? rāge pratighe māne 'vidyāyāṃ dṛṣṭau vicikitsāyāṃ kathaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1885: śikṣitavyam? mātsarye dāne dauḥśīlye śīle vyāpāde kṣāntau kauśīdye vīrye vikṣepe dhyāne dauṣprajñe prajñāyāṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? vikalpe śūnyatāyāṃ nimitte ānimitte mithyāpraṇihite samyakpraṇihite, śubhe 'śubhe dharme kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? kleśe kleśaprahāṇe saṃkleśe vyavadāne saṃsāre nirvāṇe
K02psp_6-8u:1886: dhātau kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? buddhadharmeṣu kathaṃ śikṣitavyam?
K02psp_6-8u:1887: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
K02psp_6-8u:1888: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā maitreya bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena, nāmamātrakaṃ rūpam iti śikṣitavyaṃ,
K02psp_6-8u:1889: nāmamātraṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmamātraṃ yāvad (PSP_6-8:147)
K02psp_6-8u:1891: atha maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat: yadā bhagavan savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate, yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
K02psp_6-8u:1892: savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
K02psp_6-8u:1893: vijñānaṃ, savastukam idaṃ nāmadheyam upalabhyate yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti, yad uta saṃskāranimittam upādāya, tadā kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātrakaṃ rūpam iti śikṣitavyaṃ, nāmamātraṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nāmamātraṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti
K02psp_6-8u:1894: śikṣitavyam, athāvastukam evaṃ sati tasya nāmnas tad api nāmamātraṃ na
K02psp_6-8u:1895: prayujyate yad idaṃ rūpam iti nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ, yāvad buddhadharmā iti nāmamātraṃ na prayujyate.
K02psp_6-8u:1896: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam etad avocat:
K02psp_6-8u:1897: āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti, āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam, āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yad idaṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1898: yāvad budhadharmā iti, yataś ca maitreya tena saṃskāranimittena vastūni
K02psp_6-8u:1899: rūpam ity etasmin nāmni rūpam iti saṃpratyayo bhavati, pratyayāgamaḥ
K02psp_6-8u:1900: pratisaṃvedanaḥ, tena ca maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ, āgantukam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti,
K02psp_6-8u:1901: yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti,
K02psp_6-8u:1902: tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya syād ihaikatyasya tasminn eva saṃskāranimitte
K02psp_6-8u:1903: vastūni saṃjñā vā prajñaptir vā nāma vānuvyavahāro vābhiniveśo vā.
K02psp_6-8u:1905: [bhagavān āha:] tad anenāpi te maitreya paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
K02psp_6-8u:1906: āgantukam ekam etan nāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ tasmin saṃskāranimitte vastūni yad idaṃ rūpam iti, yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
K02psp_6-8u:1907: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantam etad avocat:
K02psp_6-8u:1908: (PSP_6-8:148) evaṃ sati bhagavann upalabdha eva bhavati rūpasya svabhāvo yat tat saṃskāranimittaṃ vastu, yad upādāya nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro bhavati, yad idaṃ rūpam iti yad idaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā
K02psp_6-8u:1909: vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti.
K02psp_6-8u:1910: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam evam āha:
K02psp_6-8u:1911: saṃskāranimitte vastūni nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro rūpam iti, tat kiṃ manyase? maitreya svabhāvo vā sa rūpasya prajñaptimātraṃ veti.
K02psp_6-8u:1912: [maitreya] āha: prajñaptimātraṃ bhagavan yad idaṃ prajñaptimātram.
K02psp_6-8u:1913: bhagavān āha: tat kathaṃ maitreya tavaivaṃ bhavaty upalabdha evaṃ bhavati rūpasya svabhāva iti, yat tat saṃskāranimittavastu yad upādāya nāma saṃjñā prajñaptir anuvyavahāro bhavati, yad idaṃ rūpam iti, yad idaṃ vedanā
K02psp_6-8u:1914: saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yad idaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti. tat kiṃ manyase?
K02psp_6-8u:1915: maitreya svabhāvo vā sa vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ prajñaptimātraṃ
K02psp_6-8u:1916: [maitreya] āha: prajñaptimātraṃ bhagavan yad idaṃ prajñaptimātram.
K02psp_6-8u:1917: bhagavān āha: tat kathaṃ maitreya tavaivaṃ bhavaty upalabdha evaṃ bhavati vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya yāvad buddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāva
K02psp_6-8u:1920: rūpaṃ, saced bhagavan nāmasaṃjñāsaṃketaprajñaptivyavahāramātratvaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ yāvad buddhadharmā iti, tad evaṃ sati na tūpalabdha eva svabhāvo bhavati, rūpasya yad idan
